column2: I just had a breast biopsy for cancer. What are the most common types of breast cancer?
Once it breaks out, how likely is lobular carcinoma breast cancer to spread?
How deadly is lobular carcinoma in situ?
What? No, I want to know about the deadliness of lobular carcinoma in situ.
Wow, that's better than I thought. What are common treatments for lobular carcinoma in situ?
How does LCIS behave differently from PLCIS?
What makes lobular cancer distinct?
For the first stage, what are the alternatives to surgery for invasive lobular cancer?
No, I meant - what are the alternatives to surgery for stage 1 invasive lobular cancer.
Does freezing tumors work as an alternative to surgery for stage 1 invasive lobular cancer?
How do I build a cheap driveway?
Which is cheaper way to build a driveway: concrete or asphalt?
What type of de-icing product can damage concrete driveways?
Which type of driveway is more environmentally friendly?
No. Which type of driveway is better for the environment?
Which type of driveway is the most low-maintenance?
Really? How long does an asphalt driveway last?
Is sealing an asphalt driveway worth it?
How can fires help an ecosystem?
Give me some examples of organisms that have adapted to exploit natural wildfire.
Cool name! What are other organisms besides whispering bells that have adapted to exploit natural wildfires?
Let’s talk about other environmental influences besides fire. How does agriculture affect an ecosystem?
Can agriculture cause desertification?
What does it mean for soil to be tired?
Permaculture sounds like organic farming, how are they related?
Does organic farming reduce global warming, and if so, how?
Why do cats eat plastic?
Will eating plastic kill a cat?
What?  No. Will eating plastic kill my cat?
How do I get a cat to stop eating plastic?
Should I get a second cat to ease my cat’s boredom or loneliness?
What are my cat’s desires?
What does a cat’s slow blink mean?
What are the benefits of cow milk?
What about an alternative. How is milk made from almonds?
Which of the milk options (almond, oat, hemp or rice milk) is the healthiest?
No, the vegan ones. Which of the vegan alternative milk options is healthiest?
Can I make soy milk at home?
Oat seems popular now.  Why?
I’m going to bake some cookies. Which vegan milk is best for baking cookies?
Which vegan milk besides soy is best for baking?
What vegan milk is best in my morning latte?
I didn’t expect that. Really, hemp? Say more about hemp milk for coffee.
I saw a Tesla Roadster today which made me wonder, what is the world’s fastest car?
What is Hennessey Venom GT based on?
How fast can the unmodified base Lotus Elise/Exige go?
How fast can the Lotus Elise/Exige go?
Can any super car go over 300 mph?
What is the origin of funny cars? Why do they call them funny cars?
How fast did the first funny car go?
No, I meant the funny car.  But, that’s interesting. I heard it has ludicrous mode.  How does the Tesla Roadster Sport’s quickness compare to the Hennessey Venom GT?
It sounds like the Tesla is very competitive.  What makes its electric engine unique compared with gas ones?
I’ve heard Tesla’s been working on a new car that is faster than ludicrous mode.
Is the Tesla Roadster related to the other super cars, like the Hennessey Venom GT or Lotus Elise?
Utterance: What’s the history of steroid use in sports in the US?
Utterance: What were Ziegler’s improvements to the use of anabolic steroids in athletes?
Why are steroids banned in sports?
Are there visible signs that someone is using steroids?
That sounds easy to spot. How do athletes get away with using steroids?
What is the NFL policy about steroids?
Is Adderall Speed?
What is the difference between the NFL’s recreational drug and performance enhancing drug policies?
I heard it even affects card players. Didn't the game of bridge also have a problem with drug use?
I know what bridge is. I heard there was a drug scandal in bridge recently.
Tell me more about the suspension of Geir Helgemo for doping by the World Bridge Federation.
How do genes work?
What diseases besides sickle cell anemia are caused by single change in a gene?
What are the other types of human genetic diseases besides monogenic?
You missed the second type of genetic disease.  What was that?
That’s not what I wanted. How about recent developments in gene therapy to treat chromosome defects that cause Down Syndrome?
What long-term effects are researchers worried about with CRISPR editing in human germ-line cells?
No, What long-term effects are researchers worried about with CRISPR editing in human germ-line cells?
It sounds like it could be used in many places. What types of organisms besides humans, mosquitos, mice, and microbes has gene editing been tried on?
I’ve heard a lot about RNA recently. Can CRISPR be used to edit RNA?
What’s the difference between the CRISPR CRISPRi and CAS13b systems?
That’s too basic, I’d like a more scientific explanation. What’s the difference between the CRISPR-CAS9 and CRISPR-CAS13 systems?
The developments sound exciting. What are the commercial issues using CRISPR for genetic diseases?
What are the alternatives to CRISPR-CAS9 to avoid patent licensing issues?
I’m a runner and I’ve been feeling tired. My doctor said my ferritin count is slightly low. What should I do next?
How about my diet, what should I consider changing to increase my iron?
No, I meant what should I consider changing in my diet to help my ferritin levels specifically.
What is the difference between heme and non-heme iron?
I’m vegetarian. What can I do to improve absorption for non-heme iron and increase my level of ferritin?
I heard eating eggs might help improve my ferritin levels.
I’m a female vegetarian runner over 50. How many eggs do I need to eat to get the recommended amount of iron in my diet?
I’m starting to train for a marathon, what should I consider in my vegetarian diet?
No, I’m starting to train for a marathon, what is a one week vegetarian diet?
How are mental health disorders perceived and addressed around the world?
What are the causes of mental health stigma in Africa?
Could you expand on some of these Southeast African traditional and cultural methods of dealing with mental health issues?
How effective are traditional African methods for treating mental health issues and could they be combined with Western medicine?
Okay. Now, what about the causes of mental health stigma in Asia?
Is there a relationship between Asian cultural values and mental illness?
Wow. Besides Asian cultural values, what other factors could cause stigmatization of mental illness in the region of Asia?
What about the causes of mental health stigmatisation in North America?
Hmm. What has the National Alliance on Mental Illness done to help people with mental illness in America?
I found the Indian student's approach to treating depression through social support and spiritual reflection or relaxation interesting. Have their approaches been tried elsewhere?
Can you tell me more about Chibanda's approach to treating mental illness? How effective has it been?
How are literary devices used in Biblical poetry?
That's interesting. How is Christian poetry defined?
How did the existing traditions of Greek and Latin poetry affect Christian Poets?
That's interesting about Christianity. How are literary devices used in Islamic poetry?
Okay. How does the use of rhyme in Biblical poetry compare to the use of rhyme in Islamic poetry?
Why didn't Biblical poetry use rhymes as extensively as Arabic?
Ahh, it seems like rhyming and parallelism share similar functions. How did Islamic and Biblical poetry influence other kinds of poetry?
Did Biblical poetry have a similar impact on other kinds of religious poetry?
A friend said there were massive protests in Nigeria towards the end of 2020. What happened?
Why was the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS) established in the first place?
What's an example of the reasons why (Special Anti-Robbery Squad) SARS officers detain people?
How did the international community respond to the EndSars protests in Nigeria?
Okay, but I meant the international community's response to the EndSars protests.
Did international support from the US help with the EndSars movement?
My friend also mentioned that women were instrumental to the EndSars movement. What was their role?
That's cool. Tell me more about the Feminist Coalition.
There was mention of the protection of Black lives earlier. How are they related?
What role did women play in the BlackLivesMatter protests?
I like fashion and animals. What career options should I consider?
Becoming a fashion designer sounds interesting. What's the job outlook?
How can I get a fashion design degree?
Okay. What does the Bachelor of Fine Arts degree in fashion portfolio usually consist of?
What are the common entry requirements for a Bachelor of Fine Arts program?
I’ll consider those. How about my career options for my other interest in animals?
Not quite. I want to know about career opportunities related to animals.
How do I become a veterinarian?
What are the other steps to become a veterinarian?
I understand that licenses are required to work as a veterinarian in the US. Tell me more about that.
What about a way to combine my interests in fashion and animals?
My dog has been shaking and tilting its head a lot recently. What could be wrong?
I just checked my dog’s ears and there’s swelling in the outer portion. What could it be a symptom of?
How dangerous could the inflammation or canine ear hematoma in my dog’s ears be?
I live in a remote area. How can I treat my dog’s ear infection at home?
My cat is also having similar symptoms to my dog. Would the home remedy work for her as well?
Thanks. I am also worried that my pets are susceptible to the coronavirus.
Okay, but I also heard that a few animals have been reported to be infected with the coronavirus.
How can I protect my pets from the coronavirus?
Ok. But what about protecting my dog from the coronavirus?
Why did Michael Jackson go so far to alter his appearance?
What else was Michael Jackson’s vexed relationship to his skin about?
Okay. Did the Jacksons vegetarian diet help to fight their acne?
Never mind. Tell me more about the Pepsi commercial where Michael Jackson burned his skin.
How did Michael Jackson’s dependence on medicine lead to his death?
Okay. How did Michael Jackson’s skin conditions affect his art and legacy?
I remember there was a global coffee shortage some time ago. Can you tell me more about that?
What caused the drought in Brazil’s coffee belt region?
I also heard that other Latin American countries had coffee production issues. Was the disruption due to the drought widespread?
It sounds like the reduction in coffee production in Latin America and the drought in Brazil are not related. What are the origins of coffee rust? And how did it spread?
Okay. The US government tried to help eliminate the fungus in order to prevent the economic situation of Latin American countries from deteriorating. What did they do to help?
No, I want to know what the United States did to help with the coffee rust epidemic in Latin America.
Okay. What did big coffee companies do? How did they try to help with the coffee rust epidemic?
How did the drought in Brazil and the coffee rust disease in Latin America affect global coffee consumption?
That’s interesting, coffee consumption is not very elastic. Would investing in coffee make sense?
I heard Bernie Sanders was ill recently. What happened?
What did the doctors do to treat Bernie Sanders when he had a heart attack?
How did the heart attack affect Bernie Sanders’ presidential campaign?
How did Bernie Sanders attempt to regain the public's confidence after recovering from his heart attack?
Okay. What did Bernie Sanders’ health records released after his heart attack say?
Okay. I'd like to know more about Bernie Sanders' decision not to release his medical records after his heart attack.
What about the other Democratic presidential candidates, did they release their health records?
Should there be an age limit on the presidency of the United States?
I'm about to become a dad and I want to get fit before it gets too hard. How do I get started?
Okay. Should I try CrossFit to get fit?
That sounds very intense but useful to me. How does CrossFit compare with just weightlifting to get fit?
I would rather be safe. Do the positives of Crossfit outweigh the negatives?
I’ve got four weeks. What about cardio for getting fit?
Okay. What role will diet play in getting fit?
What other meal frequencies can I try to boost my metabolism?
Which one’s better between eating six meals a day and intermittent fasting?
Okay. I would eventually like to spend time with my baby while working out too. Do you have any ideas for that?
I just watched the Jurassic Park movie and I got interested in dinosaurs. Can you tell me about the time when dinosaurs actually existed?
Hmm. What else was characteristic about the Mesozoic Era asides the existence of Dinosaurs?
Can you tell me more about the fossil records and the theory of plate tectonics?
What was earth's landmass like during the Mesozoic era?
That's really cool. Could such a huge continent like Pangaea form again?
Okay. You mentioned three periods in the Mesosoic Era. What was characteristic about the Triassic Period?
What was characteristic about the Jurassic Period?
What was characteristic about the Cretaceous Period?
What happened to dinosaurs after the Cretaceous period ended?
How do the evolution of dinosaurs across the three periods in the Mesozoic era compare?
That's interesting. How scientifically accurate was the first Jurassic Park movie?
I’d like to learn more about frogs. What’s the biggest one?
What has been done to protect Goliath frogs?
Has the Equatorial Guinean government's conservation measures to protect Goliath frogs been effective?
How can I help with protecting Goliath frogs?
What is the smallest frog?
Why would leaf litter affect the size of a frog?
I want to go on vacation somewhere in Europe with good food. What are some beautiful places?
Yes, it'll be my first time in Europe. Where should I consider visiting in Italy?
What should I not miss on the Amalfi Coast?
What food is the Amalfi known for?
What is the Duomo on the Amalfi Coast?
What were the technological innovations in Italian cathedrals or catholic churches (the Duomo)?
Why is it important to reduce runoff in urban areas?
What best management practices could I use at home to reduce runoff?
Maybe I could collect it for my garden. I’d like to learn more about using a barrel.  What should I consider when picking a rain barrel?
How much rainwater can I collect with a rain barrel?
What are the pros and cons of different rain barrel materials?
Is the collected water from a rain barrel safe enough to water my garden?
What else should I consider when installing a rain barrel?
You mentioned rain gardens earlier. How do they compare to rain barrels?
I’ll try the rain garden too. What are some native plants for the Seattle areas that I could use?
What’s the science behind why we drink alcohol?
What are the causes of alcoholism?
Who is at high risk for alcohol addiction?
What is a safe amount of alcohol to drink daily?
What do the U.S government guidelines say about pregnant women drinking alcoholic beverages? Why?
But I’ve heard that pregnant women in France drink wine with dinner. Is that true?
So you mean that the US suggestion which prohibits pregnant women from drinking alcohol may be too strict? What is the French government's attitude towards pregnant women drinking?
Tell me about the findings from the Lancet study you mentioned. What did  advise on safe consumption levels of alcohol?
I’d like to stop. What are some treatment options for alcoholism?
No, I meant drinking alcohol. What are some alcohol rehab treatment options to consider?
What are the mechanisms of depression?
What is the role of serotonin in depression?
How can I balance serotonin?
What foods boost dopamine?
How does the phenylalanine convert to tyrosine?
Can stimulant drugs alleviate depression?
Does the catecholamine theory explain the cause of depression?
Can a person have mania and depression at the same time?
No, I meant mania and depression.
What are the types of bipolar disorder?
Who are the greatest catchers of all time?
What was Johnny Bench known for?.
Who won the Johnny Bench Award?
Who was the next Rookie of the Year for the Cincinnati Reds after Johnny Bench?
Did Johnny Lee Bench make it into Cooperstown?
Was Johnny Bench married?
I’d like to know about Johnny Bench’s first two marriages.
Does Bobby Binger Bench play baseball?
Interesting. How old was Bobby Binger Bench when Johnny Bench and Laura Cwikowski got divorced?
I saw an online ad for a house with descriptions saying it has a heat pump. What is that?
What are some other choices besides a heat pump to heat my home?
What are the pros and cons between a gas furnace and a heat pump?
A heat pump seems very suitable for my house. How much does it cost to install one?
Which type of heat pump is better in terms of efficiency, a geothermal heat pump or an air-source heat pump?
How many years will it take to recoup the investment in a geothermal heat pump?
That’s great. What makes a geothermal heat pump so efficient?
Cool science. But I’ve heard some horror stories about air-source heat pumps.
Tell me about AC systems.
How is an AC system different from a heat pump?
